name: Homejection
description:
2D pixel art competitive game. You control a lawyer and his client and you confront your ex-wife for the custody of your son during a trial. You control both with the same pad. Both the lawyer and the client have different abilities and lives. - Lawyer: Throw a book. - Client: You can do a dash. There are two endings, try to discover both!

Jam Site: 
MálagaJam Weekend 9

Jam Year: 
2019

Platforms: 
MS Windows, Linux / Unix, Web standard (HTML5, Java, JavaScript, Flash)

Tools And Technologies: 
Unity (any product)
